PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-07211998-04-300TC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of H. ANNE LIPPERT, of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a member of the Pacific Pilotage Authority to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Kenneth Bruce Hallat, whose term has expired.
Attachments
